Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Show Ground, Chesterfield Road, Mansfield March contest - 1st Kirkby Old, 2nd Bestwood, 3rd Kirkby Colliery. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 21, 2014, 3:59 p.m. July 1, 2016, 3:48 p.m.
1 Kirkby Old Harold Lowe Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
2 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band F. Wilkes Mercadante
3 Thoresby Colliery Thomas F. Ward Recollections of Beethoven [arr. Greenwood]
4 Worksop Miners Welfare Band Unknown Songs of Wales
Unknown Result Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band H. Ryder
